settings.content: # VM vs OS and DATA disks (Bandwidth and Throughput %)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where Computer == 'swat0007.europe.ifint.biz'
| where CounterName == 'Avg. Disk sec/Read'
| where InstanceName == 'O:' or InstanceName == 'P:' or InstanceName == 'R:' or InstanceName == 'C:' or InstanceName == 'D:'

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where Computer == 'swat0007.europe.ifint.biz'
| where CounterName == 'Avg. Disk sec/Write'
| where InstanceName == 'O:' or InstanceName == 'P:' or InstanceName == 'R:' or InstanceName == 'C:' or InstanceName == 'D:'

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where Computer == 'swat0007.europe.ifint.biz'
| where CounterName == '% Disk Read Time'
| where InstanceName == 'O:' or InstanceName == 'P:' or InstanceName == 'R:' or InstanceName == 'C:' or InstanceName == 'D:'

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
Perf
| where Computer == 'swat0007.europe.ifint.biz'
| where CounterName == '% Disk Write Time'
| where InstanceName == 'O:' or InstanceName == 'P:' or InstanceName == 'R:' or InstanceName == 'C:' or InstanceName == 'D:'
